nodes.text: Communications Officer, or COMMO for short, was a title held by beings who operated and controlled communications, be it aboard a starship or at a ground base. During a space battle, the COMMO's main job was to monitor transmissions between ships of the fleet.

The human Ives served as an Imperial communications officer on board the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Vigilance during the Battle of Endor. Major Taslin Brance served as a communications officer at the Resistance base on D'Qar during the Cold War. An female individual served as a communications officer in an Imperial remnant led by Moff Gideon aboard his light cruiser during his attempts to capture Grogu in 9 ABY.
